doc:
Lee de Broux https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lee_de_Broux 0 Lee de Broux (born May 7, 1941) is an American character actor of film and television who is best known for his roles in such films and television series as Chinatown, RoboCop, The Gun, Geronimo: An American Legend, Norma Rae, Cannon and Gunsmoke. Lee_de_Broux ( born May_7_,_1941 ) is an_American_character_actor of film_and_television who is_best_known for his_roles in such_films_and_television_series as Chinatown , RoboCop , The_Gun , Geronimo : An_American_Legend , Norma_Rae , Cannon and Gunsmoke .
